ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hell I play 6 hours a night, and spent well over 16 hours in planes this last weekend, what did I get to show for it?  One bubble of experience lost and a
ygData.messageBody:
> Unfortunately the answer to your problem is not going to make you happy.
> Abashi responded to a similar question today. In a nutshell, if you
> don't play 12 hours a day, the high end stuff isnt for you, and that's
> they way they planned it.

Hell I play 6 hours a night, and spent well over 16 hours in planes
this last weekend, what did I get to show for it? One bubble of
experience lost and a lot of cursing. I still don't have the elite
goods that I'd like to have, and look at how much I play. hehe.

Then again I don't play as much as Sylly.

5:00pm /who sylly
12:00pm /who sylly
2:00am /who sylly
5:00am???!!? /who sylly

Must be a really cozy job. Or you 'fell asleep' again.

Harmonic.
